engines: 3.5L Smartstream G3.5 T-GDi V6 w/ 48V e-supercharger (409 hp)
notes: First Genesis SUV on the M3 platform shared with the G80. North American GV80 launched for 2021 model year with 2.5T rear- or all-wheel drive and 3.5T AWD. 2025 GV80 Coupe introduces a 3.5T with 48V e-supercharger mild-hybrid hardware plus expanded ADAS (navigation-based cruise, remote smart parking) that require calibration and high-voltage precautions. Extensive aluminum body panels and multi-camera parking systems demand OEM procedures during collision service. Data sourced from Wikipedia Genesis GV80 article, May 27, 2025 revision.

engines: Dual electric motors AWD (429 hp Boost Mode) 77.4/84 kWh battery (Electrified GV70)
notes: Compact crossover on the M3 platform with standard AWD for the U.S. market. Electrified GV70 adds dual motors with 350 kW 800V charging (18-minute 10–80% capability) and 77.4/84 kWh packs assembled in Montgomery, Alabama, requiring high-voltage PPE and insulated tooling. 2024 refresh brings a 27-inch OLED widescreen and expanded Highway Driving Assist calibrations. Data sourced from Wikipedia Genesis GV70 article, August 12, 2025 revision.

engines: Performance dual-motor AWD (429 hp Boost Mode) 77.4/84 kWh battery
notes: E-GMP-based EV with 400V/800V multi-charging architecture (10–80% in 18 minutes at 350 kW) and V2L 3.6 kW power export. North American GV60 adds Face Connect biometric entry, Crystal Sphere shift-by-wire and advanced ADAS sensors needing calibration after collision repair. High-voltage battery isolation checks and insulated PPE are mandatory. Data sourced from Wikipedia Genesis GV60 article, August 6, 2025 revision.

engines: Dual electric motors AWD (365 hp) 87.2/94.5 kWh battery (Electrified G80)
notes: Third-generation G80 rides on the M3 platform with standard 8-speed automatic and available HTRAC AWD. North American lineup features 2.5T and 3.5T gasoline engines plus the limited Electrified G80 dual-motor AWD with 400/800V rapid charging hardware and 87.2/94.5 kWh packs (California and select state availability through 2025). 2024 refresh adds a 27-inch OLED dash that requires OEM programming after replacement. Data sourced from Wikipedia Genesis G80 article, September 22, 2025 revision.

engines: 3.5L Smartstream G3.5 T-GDi V6 w/ 48V e-supercharger (409 hp)
notes: Flagship sedan with standard HTRAC AWD, rear-wheel steering and multi-chamber air suspension that require calibration after chassis work. Long-wheelbase models add a 48V e-supercharger mild-hybrid version of the 3.5T V6 (409 hp) alongside executive rear-seat electronics, demanding careful battery isolation and diagnostics. Data sourced from Wikipedia Genesis G90 article, September 13, 2025 revision.
